name: dead eye
description:
My submission for Retro Jam 2021. Does not use the "Side-Effects" theme.

This is a prototype of Red Dead Redemption's "Dead Eye" ability in virtual reality, 'ported' to the Virtual Boy.

Assets used:

Chronos by Ludiq
VRIF by Bearded Ninja Games
Wild West Revolver by RustyKnights

'VIRTUAL BOY' logo found here.
